item.title: About
item.description: About Damon Hoody (aka toxic) Hey there! üëã I’m Damon Hoody, also known as “toxic,” and I’m your friendly neighborhood cybersecurity enthusiast, CTF (Capture The Flag) player, and a dedicated student at the Cisco Networking Academy. üåêüíª üîê Cybersecurity Enthusiast: I’m passionate about all things cybersecurity and constantly exploring the ever-evolving world of digital security. From ethical hacking to threat analysis, I’m on a mission to keep the digital realm safe.

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Welcome to tox@box - Your Cybersecurity Playground Welcome to tox@box, your personal cybersecurity playground where we unravel the mysteries of the digital world and empower you with the knowledge you need to stay secure. About tox@box At tox@box, I’m on a mission to make the internet a safer place, one byte at a time. I’m Damon Hoody (aka “toxic”), your host, and guide through the exciting and ever-evolving landscape of cybersecurity.
